Job Position: Finance Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are looking for an experienced and detail-oriented Finance Manager to join our team. The Finance Manager will oversee and manage the financial operations, including budgeting, forecasting, financial reporting, and compliance with regulatory requirements.
	The ideal candidate will have a strong analytical background, excellent communication skills, and the ability to contribute to strategic decision-making processes.


Job Responsibilities


	Oversee and manage all financial aspects of the company, including budgeting, forecasting, and financial analysis.
	Prepare and present financial statements, reports, and recommendations to senior management and stakeholders.
	Ensure timely and accurate month-end and year-end closing of financial records.

	Conduct variance analysis and provide insights to help improve financial performance.
	Coordinate with internal and external auditors to ensure proper financial controls and compliance.

	Ensure compliance with tax regulations and manage tax reporting and filing.
	Provide guidance and leadership to junior finance team members.
	Identify opportunities for cost savings, efficiency improvements, and financial risk management.
	Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in financial management.


Qualifications


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor&#39;s Degree with 7-10 years of experience.
	ICAN qualification is compulsory
	Proven experience as a Finance Manager, Financial Controller, or in a similar role.
	Strong understanding of financial management principles, accounting practices, and regulatory requirements.
	Proficiency in financial software and Microsoft Excel, QuickBooks, and other accounting software.
	Strong analytical skills and attention to detail.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to manage multiple priorities.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;dglhrexecutive@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position and location (Lagos) as the subject of the mail.",

  "description": "First Excelsia Professional Services Limited - Our client, a Microfinance institution, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketer
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	Our client&nbsp;is seeking dynamic and results-driven marketer to join its team.
	The ideal candidate must possess good marketing and business development skills and should have good knowledge of lending and financial instruments.


Job Responsibilities


	Develop and execute marketing strategies to promote various loan products (personal, business, mortgage, etc.)
	Generate and nurture leads through digital campaigns, social media, in-person events, and partnerships
	Create, manage, and optimize marketing funnels to guide prospects from interest to application
	Maintain and update the company website and ensure SEO best practices are followed
	Conduct market research to identify new opportunities and customer segments
	Build relationships with referral partners, such as real estate agents, dealerships, or financial advisors
	Coordinate with the compliance team to ensure all marketing materials meet regulatory standards
	Prepare detailed monthly marketing reports and present findings to management
	Monitor and analyze customer feedback to improve messaging and campaign performance
	Stay up to date with industry trends, competitor strategies, and emerging marketing technologies.
	Top of Form&nbsp;Bottom of Form


Person Specification


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in marketing or a related field
	Minimum of 2 years of relevant experience
	Ability to understand client needs &amp; financial objectives
	Understanding of the financial sector
	Experience in selling to all classes of client&rsquo;s traders, low-salary earners, and corporate organizations
	Report writing and documentation skills
	Excellent marketing and business development skills
	Experience in the financial sector of microlending is an added advantage


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should mail their CVs to:&nbsp;talentsearch@firstexcelsia.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

	Our client is seeking dynamic and results-driven marketer to join its team.

title: Administrative Officer Job at Future Moves Recruitment Agency Limited
content:
Future Moves Recruitment Agency Limited (FMR Agency) is an End to end HR Company in Nigeria placing quality candidates to quality Companies alongside other services. This time, our client in the REAL ESTATE industry is looking for a well experienced and competent Sales Representative.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Officer
Job Location: Mile 12 Market, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Schedule: Monday to Saturday, 8:00 AM – 5:00 PM

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a proactive and organized Administrative Officer to support our daily operations. The ideal candidate should be computer literate, have good communication skills, and be able to handle administrative and customer service tasks efficiently.


Key Responsibilities


	Handle daily administrative duties and maintain accurate records.
	Respond promptly and professionally to customer inquiries via phone, email, or in-person.
	Prepare and issue invoices and receipts for customer transactions.
	Update and maintain product prices and details on the company’s website.
	Maintain proper documentation and filing systems.
	Provide general support to management and other departments as needed.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND / NCE / HND / B.Sc. in Business Administration or a related field.
	Proficient in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel) and basic web management tools.
	Good communication and interpersonal skills.
	Strong attention to detail and ability to multitask.
	Customer-oriented with a positive attitude.
	Prior experience in an administrative or customer service role is an advantage.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send CV to: L.recruiter@fmragency.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
